resources.string: The Popcorn Time revolution is not just about online streaming, it\'s way greater than that. But it cannot happen, if you don\'t help us!

We\'ve never asked for anything in return for all the hard work we\'re putting in to this project. Now we\'re asking you for just one thing, which seems so small, but is SO important, way more important than you think:
You cannot understand how helpful this little share is to us. To this revolution.
